SEARCH
Package com.wordweave.utils

Class ValidationUtil

java.lang.Object
com.wordweave.utils.ValidationUtil
public class ValidationUtil extends Object
Utility class for validating various types of input data. Provides methods for common validation scenarios including strings, emails, passwords, phone numbers, images, and date-related validations.

    • isNullOrEmpty

      public static boolean isNullOrEmpty(String value)
      Checks if a string is null or empty (after trimming whitespace).
      Parameters:
      value - The string to validate
      Returns:
      true if the string is null or empty, false otherwise

    • isAlphabetic

      public static boolean isAlphabetic(String value)
      Validates if a string contains only alphabetic characters (a-z, A-Z).
      Parameters:
      value - The string to validate
      Returns:
      true if the string contains only letters, false otherwise

    • isAlphanumericStartingWithLetter

      public static boolean isAlphanumericStartingWithLetter(String value)
      Validates if a string is alphanumeric and starts with a letter.
      Parameters:
      value - The string to validate
      Returns:
      true if the string starts with a letter and contains only letters and numbers, false otherwise

    • isValidGender

      public static boolean isValidGender(String value)
      Validates if a string represents a valid gender ("male" or "female", case-insensitive).
      Parameters:
      value - The gender string to validate
      Returns:
      true if the value is "male" or "female" (any case), false otherwise

    • isValidEmail

      public static boolean isValidEmail(String email)
      Validates an email address format using standard email pattern.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address to validate
      Returns:
      true if the email matches standard format, false otherwise

    • isValidPhoneNumber

      public static boolean isValidPhoneNumber(String number)
      Validates a Nepali phone number format (starts with 98 followed by 8 digits).
      Parameters:
      number - The phone number to validate
      Returns:
      true if the number starts with 98 and has 10 total digits, false otherwise

    • isValidPassword

      public static boolean isValidPassword(String password)
      Validates password strength requirements: - At least 8 characters long - Contains at least one uppercase letter - Contains at least one digit - Contains at least one special character (@$!%*?invalid input: '&')
      Parameters:
      password - The password to validate
      Returns:
      true if the password meets all requirements, false otherwise

    • isValidImageExtension

      public static boolean isValidImageExtension(jakarta.servlet.http.Part imagePart)
      Validates if an uploaded image file has an allowed extension (.jpg, .jpeg, .png, .gif).
      Parameters:
      imagePart - The uploaded file part to validate
      Returns:
      true if the file has a valid image extension, false otherwise

    • doPasswordsMatch

      public static boolean doPasswordsMatch(String password, String retypePassword)
      Validates if two password strings match each other.
      Parameters:
      password - The original password
      retypePassword - The password to compare against
      Returns:
      true if both passwords are non-null and equal, false otherwise

    • isAgeAtLeast16

      public static boolean isAgeAtLeast16(LocalDate dob)
      Validates if a date of birth indicates the person is at least 16 years old.
      Parameters:
      dob - The date of birth to validate
      Returns:
      true if the age is 16 or older, false otherwise or if dob is null
